title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, push, create models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same surface as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use Ollama models as LLM or embeddings in LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat UI, model manager, multi-user, OpenAI-compat endpoint).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; fluent builder API, async & streaming, Android compatible.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem wrapping Ollama’s REST API; generate, chat, pull, create models from Ruby.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI for chatting with Ollama models, written in Go; supports markdown & syntax highlight.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: GitHub Copilot-like VS Code extension that uses local Ollama models for inline suggestions.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to run Ollama generators & embedders in production pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community cookbook of examples: PDF chat, voice bots, function calling, RAG, etc.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-host Discord bot that chats in channels/threads using any Ollama model.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU & PVC support.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Docker-compose stack bundling Ollama + Open WebUI + GPU support for quick local/cloud setup.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG example using Ollama embeddings + Chroma + LangChain to chat over your documents.

title: ollama-fastapi
summary: FastAPI service that wraps Ollama with JWT auth, rate-limiting, and usage logging.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack Bolt bot that streams answers from Ollama models in threads; easy one-file deploy.

title: ollama-dart
summary: Dart/Flutter package for chatting with Ollama; supports streaming and embed endpoints.

title: ollama-macos-menu
summary: Native macOS menu-bar app to start/stop Ollama and switch models from the status bar.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix derivation to build & run Ollama declaratively on NixOS with GPU drivers.
